title: Revelation in Seven Weeks: A Bible Study
description: Times are demanding answers with all of the cataclysmic natural disasters and uprisings around the globe. Are we in the end of days? What does the Bible reveal to us about these things? Take a look into the astounding prophetic book of Revelation with this daily Bible study devotional. Great to use in groups. Individuals are advised to use the teacher's manual in conjunction with this book, or those leading a group discussion, for further insight.
author: Jori Aguilar Sams
